flow.descriptionCdata:
79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.01ec3383-b6f2-407a-934c-10bd2d3737e2.prompt=Group Name 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.21223cb2-4ab0-41a7-94c3-adebb666535f.description=
Moves a change to the next phase

Inputs\:
host - The DNS name or IP Address of your Service Manager host
port - The port to connect to your Service Manager host on.
protocol - The protocol to connect to your Service Manager host with. Either HTTP or HTTPS.
username - The username for the Service Manager host.
password - The password for the Service Manager user.
smVersion - Version of Service Manager. If the given value is empty or contains only spaces the default version 'sm93x' will be used.
id - ID of the ticket

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
smMessage - Service Manager request brief message
smMessages - Service manager request additional messages
smReturnCode - Service Manager request's return code
smStatus - Service Manager request return status
79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.32096caa-ad14-42b2-bd44-ef54060a7423.prompt=AdvantageInc Available Groups\: ${groupList} Please type the Group name where the users must be added\: 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.35109767-4f26-4d35-b233-60e160c9e794.description=
This operation can be used to control the path of execution that a flow takes. It allows you to manually select the flow's response. 
When the execution of the flow reaches a "Manual" step, after the step starts, you are prompted to select the response to follow from a selection list. Each response corresponds to a step that follows the "Manual" step in the flow. This step can be followed by any number of steps.

Example\: You have a simple flow that has a "Manual" step as the start step, followed by two steps named "Read From File" and "Write To File". When the execution of the flow reaches the "Manual" step, you are prompted to select the response of this step. You can choose between "Read From File" and "Write To File".
79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.35152ff0-3d41-47e8-a3cc-ea7bb11d1ec6.prompt=Employee ID 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.3a5dfc58-63fa-4243-a8b9-b0959535be4f.description=
Sends an smtp email
 
Input Parameters\:
hostname - hostname or ip address of smtp server
port - port smtp service is listening
from - from email address
to - email address(s) or recipients
subject - email subject
body - body of the email
htmlEmail - true or false, whether the email should be sent supporting html rich email.
readReceipt - true or false, whether or not to request a read receipt
attachments - comma separated list of files to attach (must be full path)
username - if SMTP authentication is needed, the username to send
password - the password to use
 
 Responses\:
 passed - successfully sent the email
 failure - failed to send the email
79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.44a40fdb-7f1e-40ea-ab03-4521bdd35578.prompt=New User UID(username) 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.45f796dc-0097-4f50-bedc-b7a8bf47de37.prompt=New User UID(username) 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.5d6facf4-c638-45d9-a1f5-2b4aeeb5db17.prompt=Surname 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.70460c1a-aee7-4ece-b911-aed80c19b26a.prompt=New User Account Password 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.7be30382-3645-4ee8-870e-32ac819436fc.prompt=Given Name 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.8531864a-6555-4d6f-ac1a-0f3a247127fe.prompt=New User UID(username) 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.887ec1ea-d278-4a7b-b607-8643db242e26.description=
This operation does not do anything. It can be used to filter flow variables by defining them as inputs and filtering them in the Results tab.

Inputs\:
    field1 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
    field2 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
    field3 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
    field4 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the value of  "field1" as it was specified at input or when filtered. 

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.887ec1ea-d278-4a7b-b607-8643db242e26.prompt=Change ${ticketId} was not Initiated or was not Approved. Check it in Service Manager. 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.8f56d619-5313-4606-812d-7f678c3ce544.prompt=Email Address 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.947efb06-909e-4622-889a-c9f6175605e0.prompt=Employee ID 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.97b48658-326f-4b3d-9ccc-1f98cdcc2f38.prompt=Surname 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.9a3468bf-9a5b-43cb-88a8-39ac5c559cab.prompt=New User Account Password 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.cabc34ba-1384-46c0-9f8e-d5bac18540d1.prompt=Given Name 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.description=Onboarding\: The process of integrating new employees into Advantage Inc., preparing them with the tools they need to succeed at their job, and helping them become fully engaged, productive members of the Corporation. 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.f02eeb58-d358-478c-9b71-7e3718211c70.prompt=New User UID(username) 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.f26f99eb-3685-4bb0-aa3b-aaa2f5b141b1.prompt=Ticket ID\: 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.f6e5568d-dda1-4ac3-b176-d765865a710b.prompt=Email Address 79372c62-9dd9-4e13-aac8-8b8213cf05d6.fd70b6ed-073d-4ffb-a111-d046c0ef6b35.prompt=Service Manager Version\:
flow.name: Onboarding New Employee

staticBinding.value:
New Employee Access Details :

Username: ${ldap_username}
Password: ${ldap_userPassword}
Email: ${ldap_email}
EmpId: ${ldap_employeeNumber}
Group Membership: ${groupMembership}
Ticket ${ticketId} Status : ${smMessage}
